title: Cannot Synchronize a .java File and Another Resource
description: When attempting to synchronize a .java file with another resource in the package viewer, an issue is encountered.
OB: When trying to synchronize a .java file with another resource (e.g., a .properties file) in the package viewer, the synchronization process fails.
EB: I expect the synchronization of a .java file with another resource to work correctly in the package viewer without any errors.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the package viewer.
2. Select a .java file and another resource (e.g., a .properties file).
